Name: Aimpoint Comp M2 Red Dot Sight
Description: <color=#FF0000>Typically, the sight picture of this sight may be incorrect each time you enter the game. To fix it, detach it from the gun, aim with any gun that does not have this sight equipped, then reattach it.</color> The Aimpoint Comp M2 is a red dot reflex sight manufactured by Aimpoint, also known as the M68 CCO. It was extensively used by the US military and is now commonly found in various law enforcement agencies and civilian modifications.
